org.dockbox.selene.server.minecraft.inventory

Interface PositionInventory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Inventory
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    InventoryRow
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractInventoryRow, PlayerInventory, SpongeInventoryRow, SpongePlayerInventory

    public interface PositionInventory
extends Inventory

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Item getSlot(int row, int column)
      Gets the Item in the requested position within the inventory.
      void setSlot(Item item, int row, int column)
      Sets the item at the given position within the inventory to the given Item.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.dockbox.selene.server.minecraft.inventory.Inventory

        capacity, contains, count, findMatching, getAllItems, give

    • Method Detail

      • getSlot

        Item getSlot(int row,
             int column)
        Gets the Item in the requested position within the inventory. If the position is out of bounds, or if there is no item present, MinecraftItems.getAir() is returned instead. Indices start at zero.
        Parameters:
        row - The row index
        column - The column index
        Returns:
        The Item, or air.

      • setSlot

        void setSlot(Item item,
             int row,
             int column)
        Sets the item at the given position within the inventory to the given Item. If the position is out of bounds, nothing happens. Indices start at zero.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to place
        row - The row index
        column - The column index
